name: RPG-TDSG 6
description:
What more can I say?

I made a Tower Defense Game in Unity to accomodate the multiple ideas I had acquired from Omegle. These included:

• Agriculture, Shooting, Driving, RPG (uhhh), Grass and Colorful.

I tried my best to accomodate at least most of those ideas, however some stuff may be missing from this game.

I apologize for the lack of content being available as I spent way too much time working on a "multiplayer!" mode that is now defunct because of server host outages. Most pople using the same solution as I are also hving this problem.

Thank you for being awesome in 2022, And post your best scores and strategies below. I wanna see them.
